archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Resource Task Item Sequence Control
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Resource Task Item Sequence Control: Because of the �Resource Task Item Decomposition� of an orchestration request the result may be several actions that need to take place in a specific sequence. Each action is an item in the �Resource Task Item Sequence� and will perform according to a pre-configured configuration. The �Resource Task Item Sequence Control� controls the execution of each Item�s action.
